page.title: 13GURNARD PINES.
page.content: Gurnard Pines is a holiday village where people stay.There is a big swimming pool there.It was built just after the 2nd world war.There are lots of pine trees from Canada in the grounds.They were planted nearly 100 years ago.Besides the holiday chalets there is a clubhouse,a kitchen and a dining room.About 200 families can stay in the village.The Pines covers 48 acres and Mr and Mrs Mackenzie have planted 500 trees in the last 10 years.In the clubhouse there is a games room where you can play snooker and tabletennis.There is a stage and a dancefloor.Gurnard Pines opens from Easter to September,and the busiest time is in July and August.
